title: Calories in 100 Grams of Watermelon
meta_description: Discover calories in 100 gm watermelon, including carbs, sugars, hydration benefits, full nutrition breakdown, and simple tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Fresh, raw red-fleshed watermelon, seedless, no added sugars or seasonings; edible portion only.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels for processed products.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of watermelon provides ~30 kcal, mostly from natural sugars, with high water content for hydration.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100 gm watermelon?
faqs.a: Approximately 30 kcal for fresh, raw watermelon.
Yes, about 7.6 g carbs per 100 g, mostly natural sugars with 0.4 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does watermelon have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.6 g protein and 0.2 g fat per 100 g.

faqs.q: Why is sodium low in watermelon?
faqs.a: Naturally very low at 1 mg per 100 g; great for low-sodium diets.

faqs.q: How does ripeness affect calories in watermelon?
faqs.a: Riper fruit has slightly higher sugars and calories; average is ~30 kcal per 100 g.
